title: Rotational KE - 2 cylinders up the same ramp

content.question: A hollow cylinder and uniform solid cylinder of the same mass and radius roll along a horizontal surface. The hollow cylinder and solid cylinder both roll up a ramp and momentarily come to rest at vertical heights <math alttext="h sub H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>H</mtext></msub></math> and <math alttext="h sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>S</mtext></msub></math>, respectively, above the horizontal surface. Both cylinders roll without slipping at all times. If the cylinders had the same initial linear speeds at the bottom of the ramp, which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="h sub H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>H</mtext></msub></math> to <math alttext="h sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>S</mtext></msub></math> and provides reasoning to support the comparison?

choices.label: <math alttext="h sub H is greater than h sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>H</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>S</mtext></msub></math>. The hollow cylinder had more mechanical energy at the bottom of the ramp than the solid cylinder.

<math alttext="h sub H is greater than h sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>H</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>S</mtext></msub></math>. The force of gravity exerted on the hollow cylinder is less than the force of gravity exerted on the solid cylinder.

<math alttext="h sub S is greater than h sub H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>S</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>H</mtext></msub></math>. The solid cylinder had more mechanical energy at the bottom of the ramp than the hollow cylinder.

<math alttext="h sub S is greater than h sub H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>S</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>H</mtext></msub></math>. The force of gravity exerted on the solid cylinder is less than the force of gravity exerted on the hollow cylinder.

content.answer: <math alttext="h sub H is greater than h sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>H</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>h</mi><mtext>S</mtext></msub></math>. The hollow cylinder had more mechanical energy at the bottom of the ramp than the solid cylinder.
